entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@realDonaldTrump If only the White House spent a fraction of its time actually trying to defeat this virus instead of spending 1000000 man-hours trying to convince us that Trump's fairy tale about the "witch hunt" has merit.
